wikipedia_page.main: Billy Hole  ((1897-11-01)1 November 1897 – (1983 -12-07)7 December 1983) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1921 and 1928, playing 9 matches and scoring 1 goal. He played his first match on 9 April 1921, against Ireland and his last match on 17 November 1928 against England.

response: *Billy Hole (1897-1983), Welsh international footballer and father of Barrie Hole
